item.title: The rising relevance of Cloud Native Programming
item.description: I got to learn about Cloud Native Computing Foundation as I was browsing through Helm. From CNCF website: The Cloud Native Computing Foundation (CNCF) hosts critical components of the global technology infrastructure. CNCF brings together the worldâ€™s top developers, end users, and vendors and runs the largest open source developer conferences. CNCF is part of the nonprofit Linux Foundation. It is also important to understand the meaning of cloud native computing and what the approach covers / recommends.
